snippet: Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio faces cascading challenges: As he aims to help New Yorkers, some like Luz Delgado are seeing their worlds close in from federal budget cuts.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column asserts that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio faces cascading challenges, as he aims to help New Yorkers who are seeing their worlds close in due to federal budget cuts in vital programs; holds that New York City's commitment to preserving a social safety network is quietly heroic and increasingly difficult.
lead_paragraph: Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio faces cascading challenges: As he aims to help New Yorkers, some like Luz Delgado are seeing their worlds close in from federal budget cuts.

headline.main: What Washington Gives New York: Added Strain on the Social Safety Net
headline.print_headline: What Washington Gives New York: Added Strain on the Social Safety Net

keywords.value: Department of Housing Preservation and Development (NYC)
